title: NiCE Launches Cognigy Simulator to Test and Scale AI Agents
summary: NiCE has introduced a Cognigy Simulator, a controlled simulation environment for testing and scaling AI agents before their deployment in enterprises. This tool will allow businesses to evaluate the performance of production-grade AI agents in a controlled setting. This could potentially enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of AI in customer service by ensuring that AI agents are fully optimized before being deployed.
hook: NiCE launches Cognigy Simulator for pre-deployment testing of AI agents!

title: Big CX Update: How Tata Communications Is Transforming Customer Interactions with AI
summary: Tata Communications is leveraging AI to transform customer interactions, focusing on AI-first customer experience from voice and orchestration to agentic workflows at an enterprise scale. The strategic move signifies a major AI deployment in the customer service sector. However, the article does not provide details on the specific AI CS ecosystem players involved or the nature of AI features launched.
hook: Tata Communications is revolutionizing CX with an AI-first approach!

title: CloudOffix Partners with Bluefox SAS to Drive Smart Transformation for Businesses in Mauritius
summary: CloudOffix, an AI-native unified front-office platform, has entered into a strategic partnership with Bluefox SAS to expedite smart, sustainable transformation for businesses in Mauritius. The partnership aims to strengthen business performance and enable reliable, practical use of AI. The AI platform is designed to think, scale, and evolve with the client’s business.
hook: CloudOffix and Bluefox SAS partner to drive AI-powered business transformation in Mauritius.

title: Fivetran Selected by Vistaprint to Power Data Activation and Personalized Customer Experiences
summary: Vistaprint has chosen Fivetran, an automated data movement leader, to support its transition towards modern data activation and AI-ready customer experiences. Fivetran will power secure, automated data pipelines and reverse ETL, connecting governed first-party data directly into the tools Vistaprint uses across its marketing and customer engagement ecosystem. This move signifies an important step in Vistaprint's strategy to leverage AI in enhancing customer service and engagement.
hook: Vistaprint embraces AI with Fivetran for enhanced customer experiences!

title: Dialpad and TD SYNNEX Partner to Bring Agentic AI Communications to Global Markets
summary: Dialpad, an AI-powered business communications and agentic platform, has announced a global distribution partnership with TD SYNNEX, a technology solutions aggregator. This partnership will extend Dialpad's unified communications (UCaaS), contact center (CCaaS), and Agentic AI solutions to TD SYNNEX's international portfolio of technology partners. The move aims to provide businesses worldwide with Dialpad's AI-driven solutions.
hook: Dialpad partners with TD SYNNEX to distribute AI-driven communication solutions globally.

title: Amperity Introduces the First Enterprise Customer Data Agent that Turns AI Insight Into Live Segments and Journeys
summary: Amperity has launched its Customer Data Agent, an enterprise AI agent that combines AI insights with actionable results. The tool is built on unified customer data and enhances Amperity’s existing segmentation and journey capabilities, making insights more accessible and enabling marketers to create segments and journeys more quickly and confidently. This development indicates a strategic move towards leveraging AI to improve customer service and marketing efficiency.
hook: Amperity's new AI agent turns insights into action for faster marketing!

title: Amperity Introduces the First Enterprise Customer Data Agent that Turns AI Insight Into Live Segments and Journeys
summary: Amperity, an AI-powered Customer Data Cloud, has launched its Customer Data Agent, an enterprise AI agent that combines AI insights with actionable results. The new tool, built on unified customer data, enhances Amperity's existing segmentation and journey capabilities, making insights more accessible and allowing marketers to create segments and journeys faster. This advancement in AI technology is expected to increase the speed and confidence in marketing decisions.
hook: Amperity's new AI agent turns insights into actionable results for marketers.

title: Vonage Deepens Native Contact Center with Salesforce’s Agentforce Voice Integrations
summary: Vonage, now a part of Ericsson, has announced a new integration between its Contact Center and Salesforce’s Agentforce 360, creating a unified AI-powered platform aimed at enhancing customer experience. The integration combines Vonage for Salesforce Voice with Agentforce Voice, Salesforce’s voice-powered AI agent, transforming contact centers into personalized, scalable customer engagement platforms. This strategic move combines voice and AI to create an AI-Powered Persona for customer service.
hook: Vonage integrates with Salesforce's Agentforce, creating a unified AI-powered CS platform.

title: Vonage Deepens Native Contact Center with Salesforce’s Agentforce Voice Integrations
summary: Vonage, now a part of Ericsson, has announced a new integration between Vonage Contact Center and Salesforce’s Agentforce 360, creating a unified AI-powered platform to enhance customer experience. This integration combines Salesforce's voice-powered AI agent, Agentforce Voice, with Vonage for Salesforce Voice, transforming contact centers into personalized, scalable customer engagement platforms. The move signifies a strategic partnership between a CPaaS and a CS platform, leveraging AI to improve customer service.
hook: Vonage integrates with Salesforce's Agentforce for an AI-powered customer service boost!

title: MarTech Interview with Jackie Palmer, VP of Product Marketing @ ActiveCampaign
summary: Jackie Palmer, VP of Product Marketing at ActiveCampaign, highlights the company's shift towards an AI-first and outcome-oriented approach in their product vision. This strategic move signifies the company's commitment to leveraging AI to enhance their customer service offerings. However, specific details about the AI features, partnerships, or deployments were not provided in the article.
hook: ActiveCampaign shifts towards AI-first approach in customer service!
